get.summary: Check how much sta.sh space a user has available for new uploads.

parameters.name: artist_comments
parameters.description: Additional information about the submission provided by the author

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: An array of tags describing the submission. Letters, numbers and underscore only.

parameters.name: original_url
parameters.description: A link to the original, in case the artwork has already been posted elsewhere. This field can be restricted with a whitelist by editing your deviantART app.

parameters.name: is_dirty
parameters.description:
Is the submission being worked on currently. 
                    You can use this flag to warn users that the item is being edited and may change if they reload.
                    Note this does NOT provide any type of locking.

parameters.name: itemid
parameters.description:
The id of an existing Sta.sh submission.
                    This can be used to overwrite files and /metadata of existing submissions.
                    If you make a new API call containing files, the files that were previously associated with the artwork will be replaced by the new ones.

parameters.name: stack
parameters.description: The name of the stack to create and place the new submission in. Applies to new submissions only. (Ignored if stackid is set)

parameters.name: stackid
parameters.description: The id of the stack to create and place the new submission in. Applies to new submissions only.
